code: import request from'./request';export var RegisterApi=function RegisterApi(params){return request.post('/register',params);};export var LoginApi=function LoginApi(params){return request.post('/login',params);};export var ArticlesApi=function ArticlesApi(params){return request.get('/article',{params:params});};export var AddArticleApi=function AddArticleApi(params){return request.post('/article/add',params);};export var getArticleByidApi=function getArticleByidApi(params){return request.get("/article/".concat(params.id));};export var updateArticleApi=function updateArticleApi(params){return request.put('/article/update',params);};export var removeArticleApi=function removeArticleApi(params){return request.post('/article/remove',params);};export var GetInfoApi=function GetInfoApi(){return request.get('/info');};export var ChangeUserDataApi=function ChangeUserDataApi(params){return request.put('/info',params);};
